panels.title: Health / Current connections
panels.description: Current client connections (from SHOW STATUS: workers_clients).

panels.title: Health / Crash indicator
panels.description: 1=OK (no crashes in range), 0=CRITICAL (crash detected). Based on increase(manticore_searchd_crashes_total[$__range]).

panels.title: Performance / Load (All Queues)
panels.description: Load averages from SHOW STATUS: load_{1m,5m,15m}.

panels.title: Performance / Work Queue Length
panels.description: Current work queue length (SHOW STATUS: work_queue_length).

panels.title: Performance / Commands per Second
panels.description: Per-command request rate (ops/s). Uses 1m rate; includes vector(0) so zeros still render.

panels.title: Tables / Disk Mapped Cache Ratio (Worst 10)
panels.description: Worst 10 tables by disk_mapped_cached/disk_mapped ratio (lower is worse).

panels.title: Resources / FDs (searchd)
panels.description: Open file descriptors in searchd process.

panels.title: Tables Count
panels.description: Total number of tables known to searchd.

panels.title: Non-served Tables
panels.description: Tables that are present but not served.

panels.title: Cluster / Status
panels.description: Cluster status (primary/non-primary) derived from SHOW STATUS cluster_* counters.

panels.title: Docs by Table
panels.description: Indexed documents per table (top by docs).

panels.title: Load / Queue pressure
panels.description: Backlog ratio: max(work_queue_length - workers_total, 0) / workers_total. 0% means no backlog.

targets.expr: clamp_min(clamp_max(100 - ((clamp_min(max(manticore_work_queue_length_count{job="$job",instance=~"$instance"}) - max(manticore_workers_total_count{job="$job",instance=~"$instance"}), 0) / clamp_min(max(manticore_workers_total_count{job="$job",instance=~"$instance"}), 1)) * 20) - ((max(manticore_workers_active_count{job="$job",instance=~"$instance"} / clamp_min(manticore_workers_total_count{job="$job",instance=~"$instance"}, 1)) > bool 0.9) * 10) - (((sum(increase(manticore_maxed_out_error_count{job="$job",instance=~"$instance"}[$__range])) or vector(0)) > bool 0) * 30) - (((sum(increase(manticore_searchd_crashes_total{job="$job",instance=~"$instance"}[$__range])) or vector(0)) > bool 0) * 40), 100), 0)

panels.title: Tables / Health
panels.description: Per-table instant snapshot (aggregated across instance): docs, RAM, disk, rt_mem_limit_rate%, locked, optimizing.

targets.expr: 100 * sum by (table) (manticore_ram_chunk_size{job="$job",instance=~"$instance",table=~"$table"}) / clamp_min(max by (table) (manticore_mem_limit_bytes{job="$job",instance=~"$instance",table=~"$table"}) * max by (table) (manticore_mem_limit_rate_percent{job="$job",instance=~"$instance",table=~"$table"}) / 100, 1)

panels.title: Health / Maxed out (range)
panels.description: Count of maxed_out events over the selected range (server overload/rejections). Not SQL syntax errors.

panels.title: Load / Worker Saturation (History)
panels.description: workers_active / workers_total over time (spikes indicate saturation).

panels.title: Overview / Version Changes
panels.description: Version label changes over time (useful to spot upgrades).

panels.title: Health / Crashes (range)
panels.description: searchd crashes in selected range (parsed from searchd.log).

panels.title: Health / Restarts (range)
panels.description: Restarts in selected range (based on uptime resets).
